metadata.name: Binance CEX
metadata.description: Binance is a cryptocurrency exchange which is the largest exchange in the world in terms of daily trading volume of cryptocurrencies
metadata.methodology: We collect the wallets from this binance blog post https://www.binance.com/en/blog/community/our-commitment-to-transparency-2895840147147652626. We are not counting the Binance Recovery Fund wallet

metadata.name: Bitfinex
metadata.description: Bitfinex facilitates a graphical trading experience with advanced charting functionality that allows traders to visualise orders, positions and price alerts

metadata.name: Gate
metadata.description: Established in 2013, Gate is a cryptocurrency exchange serving over 23 million global users. The platform supports spot trading, futures contracts, margin trading, and wealth management products for more than 3,800 cryptocurrencies, using zero-knowledge technology to ensure transparency and verifiability of user assets. Various Gate entities have obtained or completed regulatory registrations, licences, authorizations, or approvals across various jurisdictions, such as Lithuania, Argentina, Malta, Italy, Gibraltar, Bahamas, and Hong Kong.

metadata.name: HTX
metadata.description: Huobi Global is a world-leading cryptocurrency trading exchange.
metadata.methodology: We added the wallets from here https://github.com/huobiapi/Tool-Node.js-VerifyAddress/blob/main/snapshot/huobi_por_20230701.csv . We are not tracking 3 wallets, 2 on Heco Chain, 1 on BTTC chain. We also count stUSDT.

metadata.name: KuCoin
metadata.description: cex

metadata.name: Bitstamp
metadata.description: Bitstamp makes trading easy, fast & reliable. With live customer support, staking and bank-grade security & insurance. Trusted Crypto Exchange Since 2011.

metadata.name: SwissBorg
metadata.description: Making crypto wealth management accessible to everyone.
metadata.methodology: The list of wallets can be found at https://github.com/SwissBorg/pub. We also publish monthly our Proof of Liabilities at https://swissborg.com/proof-of-liabilities/audits. The total assets do not take into account the assets in DeFi.

metadata.name: Bitkub
metadata.description: No.1 licensed bitcoin exchange in Thailand that offers services to individuals who intend to buy, sell cryptocurrency

metadata.name: Indodax
metadata.description: Indodax is a centralized cryptocurrency exchange established in 2014 and is registered in Indonesia

metadata.name: BloFin
metadata.description: Trade with Next-gen Experience, Profit from Functioning Strategies, and Keep Your Crypto Safe.

metadata.name: Flipster
metadata.description: Flipster has a wide selection of over 300 perpetual futures listings, including Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH), that can be traded with leverage of up to 100x.
metadata.methodology: All reserves information can be found here https://flipster.io/support/proof-of-reserves.

metadata.name: Lofty
metadata.description: Fractionalized real estate on Algorand.

metadata.name: xALGO Liquid Staking
metadata.description: Interest bearing liquid token for Algorand staking.

metadata.name: Folks Finance Lending
metadata.description: Innovative DeFi platform to lend, borrow, trade and manage digital assets.

metadata.name: Vesta Equity
metadata.description: Build wealth with a portfolio of tokenized, regulatory-compliant, and verified fractionalized home equity investments in top residential properties.

metadata.name: pNetwork
metadata.description: pNetwork is a protocol that enables cross-chain operations, such as transferring assets from one blockchain to another. It is designed to provide interoperability between different blockchain networks, allowing users to take advantage of the unique features and capabilities of each network while still being able to access and use their assets on other networks.
metadata.methodology: Queries the pNetwork database, using the same API endpoint as their own UI. TVL is based on the amount of assets “locked” in the system and that therefore has a 1:1 tokenization on a host blockchain, including all of the assets and all of the blockchains supported by pNetwork.

metadata.name: Meld Gold
metadata.description: One Meld Token equates to one gram of the corresponding precious metal that is fully redeemable and housed in a network of secure vaults and facilities.

metadata.name: Messina Bridge
metadata.description: Messina.one is a cross-chain protocol built on top of Wormhole that aims to enable the next 1B blockchain users.
metadata.methodology: Fetches assets currently held by Messina.one contracts.

metadata.name: Compx CDP
metadata.description: CDP protocol on Algorand.

metadata.name: Cometa
metadata.description: Liquidity hub on Algorand: Yield Farming, Liquidity-as-a-Service, DEX aggregator.

metadata.name: Algofi Lend
metadata.description: Decentralized lending protocol and stablecoin built on Algorand

metadata.name: AlgoRai Finance
metadata.description: AlgoRai creates robust and transparent DeFi structured products on Algorand ecosystem. We provide users with a means to separate and harvest inherent volatility on their underlying assets through our option vault strategies.

metadata.name: Vestige
metadata.description: Vestige is the most reliable data platform for Algorand assets, integrating multiple data sources into easy to digest asset pages. It allows traders to find new ASA's as well as monitor their value and trade across all dexes. It also offers a vast amount of DeFi tools like token lockers and launchpads
metadata.methodology: Counts tokens in LPs only, transforms the price to USD and * them by 2 to account for the other side.

metadata.name: Alpha Arcade
metadata.description: Alpha Arcade is a decentralized prediction marketplace built on the Algorand blockchain, empowering users to forecast outcomes across sports, geopolitics, crypto, business, and more
metadata.methodology: TVL represents the total value held in escrow across all markets for open and matched orders on Alpha Arcade.

metadata.name: Ultraswap
metadata.description: Loop your loans through up and down positions.

metadata.name: Tardly
metadata.description: The Tardly No Loss Lottery is a yield lottery utilizing an on-chain verifiable random function to select a winner. Users stake ALGO into a pool that accumulates yield to a smart contract over an epoch. At the end of an epoch, the smart contract uses Algorand's Randomness Beacon to trustlessly select a winner of accumulated reward based on users' weighted stake. Users can withdraw their initial deposit at any time.
metadata.methodology: Returns total amount staked in the Tardly No Loss Lottery.

metadata.name: C3 Exchange
metadata.description: C3 Exchange offers the security and autonomy of a self-custodial exchange without compromising the functionality, performance, and ease of use expected from traditional exchanges. Additionally, C3 provides a seamless cross-chain experience, enhancing flexibility and accessibility for users across multiple blockchains.
metadata.methodology: Calculates the TVL from the contract, then remaps assets for accurate value source
